entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:34 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -23.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming clear late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
